title: La Bodega Meat LLC Recalls Beef Products Distributed Without Benefit of Import Re-Inspection
summary: WASHINGTON, June 17, 2020 - La Bodega Meat LLC, a Farmers Branch, Texas establishment, is recalling approximately 83,038 pounds of raw beef products that were not presented for import re-inspection into the United States, the U.S. Department of Agriculture’s Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS)...
impacted_products: • 51.90-lb. boxes containing various cuts of beef, including:
“BONELESS RIBEYE ROLL”, “FLANK STEAK”, “FRESH BONELESS BRISKET”, “FRESH EYE OF ROUND”, “FRESH FLAP MEAT”, “FRESH INSIDE SKIRT”
“FRESH OUTSIDE ROUND”, “FRESH TOP SIRLOIN”, “INSIDE ROUND”, “OUTSIDE SKIRT”, “PEELED KNUCKLE”, “SHOULDER CLOD”
